title: Discover the Artefact's Secrets
content: yanki Creche. The githyanki are looking for the artefact we carry. They mentioned a Githyanki Creche nearby. Perhaps we can learn more about what the artefact is there. Objective 3: Find the captain of the Githyanki Creche. A guard inside the Githyanki Creche told us to report to the captain. The guards at the entrance to the Githyanki Creche mentioned a captain.
